metadata.title: CVE-2017-16796 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In SWFTools 0.9.2, the png_load function in lib/png.c does not check thereturn value of a realloc call, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (invalid write and application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via vectors involving an IDAT tag in a crafted PNGfile.

criterions.comment: swftools package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
